data.eml:eml: First record and redescription of Macandrewella cochinensis Gopalakrishnan, 1973 (Copepoda, Scolecitrichidae) from the Red Sea, with notes on swarm formation

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article El-Sherbiny, Mohsen M., Al-Aidaroos, Ali M. (2013): First record and redescription of Macandrewella cochinensis Gopalakrishnan, 1973 (Copepoda, Scolecitrichidae) from the Red Sea, with notes on swarm formation. ZooKeys 344: 1-15, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.344.5519, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.344.5519
